creator: cbrown@fiberlink.com
text:
Greetings,
We are currently running Apache 2.0.55 on a Win32 box  and using this 
installation as a "Proxy forward" taking data coming in on one port and re-
directing it to a different machine/port. 
We are currently running into a problem when we have an encrypted packet of 
4096 or greater.  The packet seems to become malformed.
The endpoint receives something like this:
 this is the last line of the file<bunch of correct data about the file>this is 
the last line of the file
 
Has this type of problem been encountered?

creator: rpluem@apache.org
text: This looks like #37145. Could you give the patches for 37145 a try?

creator: nick@webthing.com
text: No response to Ruediger.  Assuming he guessed right and it's fixed.
